requestBody.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse API Trace

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
